empty.heading: No Projects Yet
empty.description: Check back soon for exciting new projects!

1.title: E-commerce Platform
1.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with modern web technologies. Features include user authentication, payment processing, inventory management, and responsive design for optimal user experience across all devices.

2.title: Task Management App
2.description: A collaborative task management application that helps teams organize projects, assign tasks, and track progress. Built with real-time updates and intuitive drag-and-drop functionality.

3.title: Weather Dashboard
3.description: An interactive weather dashboard that provides real-time weather information, forecasts, and historical data visualization. Features location-based services and customizable widgets.

experiences.description: Developed and maintained responsive web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. Led frontend development for multiple high-traffic projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional user experiences.
Managed search engine marketing campaigns with budgets exceeding $500K. Optimized ad performance across Google Ads and Bing Ads, achieving 40% improvement in ROI and 25% increase in conversion rates.

educations.description: Focused on advanced web technologies including React, Node.js, and cloud computing. Completed capstone project on e-commerce platform optimization resulting in 30% performance improvement.
Comprehensive study in computer science fundamentals including algorithms, data structures, and software engineering. Graduated Magna Cum Laude with GPA 3.8/4.0.
